name: DIRE WORG

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The worg has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The worg makes three Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the worg's next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points.

actions.name: Dreadful Howl (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature within 30 feet that isn't a worg. Failure: 36 (8d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the start of the worg's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

bonus_actions.name: Warp Step
bonus_actions.text: The worg teleports, along with a willing creature of its choice within 5 feet of it, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
